command.description: Pastes test configurations from clipboard as derived test specifications of the selected test specification.
command.name: %command.name.Paste_As_Derived
Connect to winIDEA (hold SHIFT for dialog)

command.description: Clears selected section of test specification
command.name: Clear Section

command.description: Generates Python script, which executes tests
command.name: Generate Test Script ...

command.description: Refresh Global Symbols From winIDEA
command.name: Refresh

command.description: Copies selected cells / columns / rows in table to clipboard
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Copy

command.description: Deletes column from table.
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Delete_column

command.description: Deletes selected rows
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Delete_row

command.description: Pastes to selected table cells
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Paste

command.description: Cuts selected cells from table
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Cut

command.description: Inserts column to empty section
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Insert_column

command.description: Inserts empty column to the left of selected columns
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Insert_column_left

command.description: Inserts empty column right to the selected column
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Insert_column_right

command.description: Pastes (inserts) columns right to the selected columns
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Paste_columns_right

command.description: Pastes (inserts) columns left to the selected columns
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Paste_columns_left

command.description: Pastes (inserts) rows above the slected rows
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Paste_rows_above

command.description: Pastes (inserts) rows below the selected rows
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Paste_rows_below

command.description: Inserts empty row above the selected rows
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Insert_row_above

command.description: Inserts empty row below the selected rows
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Insert_row_below

command.description: Pastes (inserts) columns from clipboard
command.name: %command.name.KTable_Paste_columns

command.description: Optimize test vectors - marks all test cases derived from the selected test case, which do not increase coverage.
command.name: Optimize Test Vectors

command.description: Greates groups with filters for core, partition, module and function.
command.name: Create Gro&ups ...

command.description: Deletes groups which have no children and no test cases.
command.name: Delete Empty Groups

command.tooltip: Recursively scans selected test cases and groups for empty sections and removes them. This releases memory and optimizes table view.
If pressed, analyzer is not active even if set in test cases. To be used during test development to speed up test execution.
Opens dialog for automatic test group creation.
Deletes groups which have no children and no test cases.
Opens wizard for automatic test case generation
Marks all test cases derived from the selected test case, which do not increase coverage.
Dry run mode. If pressed, test cases are modified during test execution according to test results and settings in section 'Dry run'.
Show source code for item selected in Outline view. Hold SHIFT to show analyzer file.
Quick debug runs the selected test by stopping execution at the function start.
Debug mode - if pressed, test environment is not restored after test execution error - you can see the actual point of failure in winIDEA.

product.description: Application for editing and running unit tests with iSYSTEM tools.
product.name: iSYSTEM testIDEA

page.name: Target Initialization Before Each Test Case

shortcut.description: This launch configuration runs iSYSTEM testIDEA tests on embedded target.
shortcut.label: testIDEA launch
